message.body: What's a good background for 50s scene?
Glenn. I'm going to upload what I did tonight so that you can see what images I have for the green screens and you can tell me what you think
Its takes hours to process so I'll send you a link in the morning. Getting ready for bed now
Ok, I was thinking about your question about the 50's background, and was thinking maybe something reminiscent of the old tv shows, like the Ed Sullivan show.
If you can find something online lemme know. I'll look more tomorrow
Ok, sounds good.
Yeah so tomorrow don't really be concerned with the cuts or anything all I really did sync the audio to the clips and cropped them. But you'll get the idea
Thanks, I'm going to forward this to Jacob and Brad, and get their thoughts.
OK let me know
So I'm thinking open with modern band until first chorus. Then intersperse diff time periods 2nd verse until monk dance. Then end on modern band where you start, "I'll be back tomorrow"
Tell me if that sounds ok
Yeah, I think that would work. And maybe throw in a few drinking clips in the closing section as well.
Cool. Find anything for 50s backdrop?
I just e-mailed you a few links of Buddy Holly, Jerry Lee Lewis, and Chuck Berry. Maybe there's something that can resemble the backgrounds from those old TV performances?
Got it. So is the opening how you wanted it?
Yeah, I think so.
ok I am gonna take vids offline at lunch. The other guys get to look at it? Other backgrounds OK?
I haven't heard from them yet.
K
Would you mind leaving it there until tonight? Jacob can't watch it until he gets home at 4:00.
OK just lemme know when I should take it down
The one thing I was thinking about the castle background is that while it looks very good visually, it makes me think medieval, not renaissance. I had a few ideas.
OK if you got some images you think are better feel free to email me.
Perhaps a renaissance painting such as Raphael's school of Athens, or botticelli's primavera could make a good background. Or, maybe the leaning tower of Pisa?
OK tower of Pisa might work nicely
I dun think a painting would look as good

One other thing: between the monk dance and the "I'll be back tomorrow" line there is a third chorus. There should probably be more interspersing of different time periods in that section (from 2:30-2:55) as well.
Right that was the plan
Ok, cool.
No problem. It looks like a fun video. Think it'll come out nice
Ok, they saw it. They seem pretty happy with how things are going.
OK cool
By the way, if you don't find anything that you like, I think the background you chose for the 50's, with the car, was pretty good.
OK I'll keep looking for something better. Not thrilled with that
